content.text: I'll create a git commit following the instructions. Let me first check the changes that have been made.

input.description: Check what changes have been made

content.content:
diff --git a/src/components/Game.tsx b/src/components/Game.tsx
index 181cdf5..8efdd5e 100644
--- a/src/components/Game.tsx
+++ b/src/components/Game.tsx
@@ -68,6 +68,7 @@ export const Game: React.FC = () => {
         style={{
           display: 'grid',
           gridTemplateColumns: 'repeat(4, 75px)',
+          gridTemplateRows: 'repeat(4, 75px)',
           gap: '10px',
           backgroundColor: '#bbada0',
           padding: '10px',
diff --git a/src/components/Tile.tsx b/src/components/Tile.tsx
index 29478d4..cd11051 100644
--- a/src/components/Tile.tsx
+++ b/src/components/Tile.tsx
@@ -37,8 +37,8 @@ export const Tile: React.FC<TileProps> = ({ value }) => {
         fontSize: value! > 1024 ? '30px' : '40px',
         fontWeight: 'bold',
         borderRadius: '3px',
-        width: '100%',
-        height: '100%',
+        width: '75px',
+        height: '75px',
         transition: 'background-color 0.15s ease-in-out, color 0.15s ease-in-out'
       }}
     >
